definition: Sichuan basin
four/4
abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China
river/creek/plain/an area of level country
basin/flower pot/unit of volume equal to 12 斗[dou3] and 8 升[sheng1], approx 128 liters/CL:個|个[ge4]
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: The exploitation of natural gas and gas water in Sichuan Basin has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 四川盆地天然气和气田水开发历史悠久。

sentences.english: It should mainly seek local interlayered oxidized zone sand type uranium deposit in SiChuan basin .
sentences.chinese: 四川盆地应以寻找局部层间氧化带砂岩型铀矿为主。

sentences.english: Sichuan White Goose is the major local breed in rice production region of Sichuan Basin.
sentences.chinese: 四川白鹅是广泛分布于四川盆地水稻产区的地方良种。

sentences.english: After Chongqing opened the port, "modern agitation " poured into Sichuan Basin along the course of the Changjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 重庆开埠后，“近代风潮”沿长江航线涌进四川盆地。

sentences.english: Kangding County is located in the transition area between the west hilly edge of Sichuan Basin and the Tibetan Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 康定县地处四川盆地西缘山地及青藏高原过渡地带。

sentences.english: What will happen during and after the pole-shift in Sichuan Basin?
sentences.chinese: 在极移期间和极移之后，四川盆地会发生什么事？

sentences.english: My hometown is a county at the edge of Sichuan Basin .
sentences.chinese: 我的家乡是四川盆地边缘的一个县。

sentences.english: In this maturing filed, the situation of water production is very complex, wells status are variety also.
sentences.chinese: 四川盆地气井出水情况非常复杂，井况条件也各异。

sentences.english: The West Sichuan depression and Central Sichuan uplift transitional zone in Sichuan Basin are slope zones.
sentences.chinese: 四川盆地川西坳陷与川中隆起过渡带是一个斜坡地带。

sentences.english: Yibin city is located in the south of Sichuan basin, belonging to the medium subtropic.
sentences.chinese: 宜宾市位于四川盆地南部，属中亚热带气候类型。

definition: Yunnan and Guizhou plateau in southwest China, covering east Yunnan, whole of Guizhou, west of Guangxi and southern margins of Sichuan, Hubei and Hunan
(geography) basin/depression
Qionglai mountains on the boundary of the Sichuan basin 四川盆地
land of plenty/Heavenly province (epithet of Sichuan, esp. area around Chengdu)
Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
Qinling mountain range in Shaanxi forming natural barrier between Guanzhong plain 關中平原|关中平原[Guan1 zhong1 ping2 yuan2] and Han River 漢水|汉水[Han4 shui3] valley
North China Plain
Tarim Basin depression in southern Xinjiang
Hengduan mountains, several parallel mountain ranges on the border between west Yunnan and Sichuan and east Tibet
Northeast Plain, also called the Manchurian Plain
Qinling mountain range in Shaanxi forming natural barrier between Guanzhong plain 關中平原|关中平原 and Han River 汉水 valley
Changjiang or Yangtze river basin
Qinghai-Tibetan plateau
Mt Longmen, the northwest boundary of the Sichuan basin, an active geological fault line/Mt Longmen in Shandong/Mt Longmen in Henan
Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.
